description:
Purify your skin and tighten your pores with the Thursday Plantation Tea Tree & Witch Hazel Toner. It contains tea tree oil, a natural antibacterial agent that removes excess oil and bacteria from the skin, as well as witch hazel, a natural astringent that improves the skin's appearance. Alcohol-free and enriched with aloe vera and calming lavender, it's suitable for all skin types - even sensitive skin.

Product Features:

  • Contains tea tree oil and witch hazel
  • Enriched with aloe vera and lavender
  • Purifies skin and tightens pores
  • Suitable for all skin types
  • Alcohol-free
  • Free from Benzoyl peroxide
  • No synthetic parabens
  • No synthetic fragrances or colours
  • No animal-derived ingredients
  • Contents: 100g
name: Thursday Plantation 100ML
